instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: NDC001 error 820-00165
threads.message:
but camera seems to work.

what is ndc001? thermal sensor?

threads.title: NDC001 error 820-00165
threads.message: What is the problem with this machine?

threads.title: NDC001 error 820-00165
threads.message:
it is fine now except that when i replaced a damaged fan latch i think i nicked and melted the edge of the camera connector

it boots fine, runs
camera works
but diagnostics say there “might be something wrong with the camera”

im pretty sure that something is my clumsiness in touching it with my soldering iron.

i guess i will try and remove a cam connector from a dojor board and be super careful putting it back.

so stupid.
